column3: a creative brunch menu with a Â daily pancake special
column4: and a nice mix of hearty and healthy options makes Snooze great for brunch with a large or small group. The Havana Dreaming sandwich (an open faced cuban sandwich with an egg on top) was delicious
column5: as was the eggs benny duo (two takes on eggs Benedict). The pancakes we had were HUGE
column6: but fluffy and light. If you're going on a weekend
column7: book off lots of time because the wait will be insane. Loss of a star for the long waits and weak coffee.
